languages.text: "Амарнат не стоит жалости. Данный проект был ущербен на уровне базовых установок. Зараза сомнений и демагогии развратила его".
"Amarnat is worth no pity. That project was faulty on a foundational level. It was corrupted by the pests of doubt and sophistry."
languages.original_text: "Амарнат не стоит жалости. Данный проект был ущербен на уровне базовых установок. Зараза сомнений и демагогии развратила его".

traits.locale_text: "Amarnat is worth no pity. That project was faulty on a foundational level. It was corrupted by the pests of doubt and sophistry."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Amarnat is worth no pity. That project was faulty on a foundational level. It was corrupted by the pests of doubt and sophistry."

languages.text: “阿玛纳特并不值得怜悯。那个项目从基础层面上就是有缺陷的，它遭到了怀疑与诡辩的腐蚀。”
languages.original_text: "Amarnat is worth no pity. That project was faulty on a foundational level. It was corrupted by the pests of doubt and sophistry."

traits.locale_text: “阿玛纳特并不值得怜悯。那个项目从基础层面上就是有缺陷的，它遭到了怀疑与诡辩的腐蚀。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Amarnat no merece compasión. Su proyecto era defectuoso desde los cimientos. Estaba corrompido por las plagas de la duda y el sofisma».
languages.original_text: "Amarnat is worth no pity. That project was faulty on a foundational level. It was corrupted by the pests of doubt and sophistry."

traits.locale_text: «Amarnat no merece compasión. Su proyecto era defectuoso desde los cimientos. Estaba corrompido por las plagas de la duda y el sofisma».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「アマルナトは同情に値しない。あのプロジェクトは基礎的なレベルで欠陥があった。疑心暗鬼と詭弁という害虫によって堕落したのだ」
languages.original_text: "Amarnat is worth no pity. That project was faulty on a foundational level. It was corrupted by the pests of doubt and sophistry."

traits.locale_text: 「アマルナトは同情に値しない。あのプロジェクトは基礎的なレベルで欠陥があった。疑心暗鬼と詭弁という害虫によって堕落したのだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Amarnat ist keines Mitleids würdig. Dieses Projekt war auf fundamentaler Ebene fehlerhaft. Es wurde durch die Seuchen des Zweifels und der Sophisterei verdorben."
languages.original_text: "Amarnat is worth no pity. That project was faulty on a foundational level. It was corrupted by the pests of doubt and sophistry."

traits.locale_text: "Amarnat ist keines Mitleids würdig. Dieses Projekt war auf fundamentaler Ebene fehlerhaft. Es wurde durch die Seuchen des Zweifels und der Sophisterei verdorben."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Amarnat ne mérite aucune pitié. Ce projet reposait sur des bases instables. Il était rongé par les pires des parasites : le doute et le sophisme. »
languages.original_text: "Amarnat is worth no pity. That project was faulty on a foundational level. It was corrupted by the pests of doubt and sophistry."

traits.locale_text: « Amarnat ne mérite aucune pitié. Ce projet reposait sur des bases instables. Il était rongé par les pires des parasites : le doute et le sophisme. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "Amarnat is worth no pity. That project was faulty on a foundational level. It was corrupted by the pests of doubt and sophistry."

languages.text: "Amarnat'a merhamet edilmemeli. Proje temelden hatalıydı. Şüphe ve safsata gibi zararlı etmenlerle yozlaşmıştı."
languages.original_text: "Amarnat is worth no pity. That project was faulty on a foundational level. It was corrupted by the pests of doubt and sophistry."

traits.locale_text: "Amarnat merhamet etmeye değmez. Proje temelden hatalıydı. Şüphe ve safsata gibi zararlı etmenlerle yozlaşmıştı."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
